meanings.sent1: I need to micturate before we leave for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: Please wait for me, I have to micturate before we go inside.
meanings.sent3: After drinking so much water, my dog had to micturate every few minutes.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river seemed to micturate endlessly into the valley below.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waterfall was like nature's way of micturating into the serene pond.
